amendatorysection.catchline: Licensees; exempt from Uniform Disposition of Unclaimed Property Act.
amendatorysection.para: Any county, city, or village licensed to conduct a lottery pursuant to the Nebraska County and City Lottery Act shall be exempt from the Uniform Disposition of Unclaimed Property Act solely with respect to unclaimed lottery prizes.

crossreference.para: Uniform Disposition of Unclaimed Property Act, see section 69-1329.
